Levels.Famous: Head photo of a famous person
Levels.Unfamiliar: Head photo of an unknown person
Levels.Scrambled: Scrambled image of a head photo

HED.Famous:
Sensory-event, Visual, (Center-of, Screen), (Image, Face, (External-evidence, Familiar)),
		   Description/Head photo of a famous person
HED.Unfamiliar:
Sensory-event, Visual, (Center-of, Screen), (Image, Face, (External-evidence, Unfamiliar)),
		   Description/Head photo of an unknown person
HED.Scrambled:
Sensory-event, Visual, (Center-of, Screen), (Image, Face, (External-evidence, Disordered)),
		   Description/Scrambled image of a head photo

event_value.LongName: Indicator of type of image repetition

Levels.6: Immediate repetition of famous photo just seen
Levels.14: Immediate repetition of unfamiliar photo just seen
Levels.18: Immediate repetition of scrambled photo just seen

HED.5: First-item Image, Face, (External-evidence, Familiar), Description/Initial presentation of famous photo
HED.6: Next-item, Description/Immediate repetition of famous photo just seen
HED.7: Later-item, Description/Delayed repetition of famous photo
HED.13: First-item, Description/Initial presentation of unfamiliar photo
HED.14: Next-item, Description/Immediate repetition of unfamiliar photo just seen
HED.15: Later-item, Description/Delayed repetition of unfamiliar photo
HED.17: First-item, Description/Initial presentation of scrambled photo
HED.18: Next-item, Description/Immediate repetition of scrambled photo just seen
HED.19: Later-item, Description/Delayed repetition of scrambled photo

stim_file.LongName: Name of the image file presented

Levels.14: Immediate repetition of unfamiliar photo just seen
